metadata.title: CVE-2022-48852 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vc4: hdmi: Unregister codec device on unbindOn bind we will register the HDMI codec device but we don't unregisterit on unbind, leading to a device leakage. Unregister our device atunbind.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
